column1: Explain common techniques for forecasting future trends in time series data (e.g., ARIMA, Prophet).
Discuss the concept of stationarity in time series analysis and how to achieve it.
Briefly explain different types of optimization algorithms used in machine learning (e.g., Gradient Descent).
Describe a situation where you used an optimization algorithm to solve a data science problem.
Discuss the importance of cost functions in machine learning models.
